intro.heading: Introduction
intro.description: AI Nike Chan is a character with relatively flexible guidelines. This page introduces how to generate images and videos of Nike Chan using AI.
intro.pointDescription: Even if you're new to AI, no problem! Try creating your own original character using these steps as a reference.

recommendedAI.heading: Recommended Image Generation AI
recommendedAI.description:
Various AI image generation tools can be used to create images of AI Nike Chan.
Each tool has its own characteristics, and you can choose according to your needs and budget.
For beginners, we recommend the free NanoBanana or NanoBanana Pro in Google AI Studio. Below we explain how to use it.
The following explanation is for NanoBanana, but it applies to NanoBanana Pro as well.

nanoBanana.heading: How to Use Nano Banana
nanoBanana.accountNote: You'll need a Google Account, so make sure to obtain one in advance.

openStudio.heading: Open Google AI Studio
openStudio.step1: and log in with your Google Account.
openStudio.step2: After logging in, you'll see a screen like below. Click on "Try Nano Banana".
openStudio.step3:
When you see a screen like below, you're ready to go. Enter text or images in the input field at the bottom.
You don't need to interact with the sidebar on the right, but "Aspect Ratio" determines the aspect ratio of the generated image, so change it as needed (displayed as width : height).

materials.heading: Prepare Reference Materials
materials.description: While image generation is possible with text instructions alone, uploading reference images improves accuracy. Let's download the following images of AI Nike Chan.

model3D.downloadLabel: Download AI Nike Chan 3D Model Image

usageMaterialsWarning.heading: About Usable Materials:
usageMaterialsWarning.description: When creating AI Nike Chan works using AI, there are materials you can use and materials you cannot. The above images are fine to use. For details, please see the Guidelines page.

prompts.heading: How to Write Prompts and Examples
prompts.description1:
In image generation AI, you can generate the desired image by entering instructions called "prompts".
Traditional image generation tools required detailed instructions and had a high barrier to entry, but Nano Banana allows for relatively natural language instructions.
Especially when referencing images, even fairly simple prompts can yield good results.

tips.heading: Prompt Tips:
tips.description1:
Even when passing reference images, fine details may not be reflected well.
For AI Nike Chan, the hairpin shape and chest text often break down.
tips.description2:
Therefore, it's important to explicitly specify fine details as character features.
I always include the text below "The girl's features are as follows." in the example above every time.

gachaWarning.heading: About Generative AI Randomness:
gachaWarning.description:
Generative AI has a strong element of randomness, and even using the same prompt produces different results each time.
Therefore, even with a perfect prompt, you may not get the expected output, so it's important to try patiently until you get results you like.

prompts.dancePrompt: An illustration using the girl depicted in this three-view drawing. She is saying "Let's do our best this week too!!"

recommendedAI.heading: Recommended Video Generation AI
recommendedAI.description1:
For generating videos with AI, we recommend Sora 2 developed by OpenAI.
It's the latest AI tool that can generate natural movements and multiple cuts, and automatically adds audio that fits the scene. It's free to use from browsers and apps.
recommendedAI.description2:
However, it has been confirmed that Sora 2 is unavailable for some users (detailed conditions are unknown).
If it's not available, try the also free Grok released by X.

sora.heading: How to Use Sora 2
sora.accountNote: You'll need a ChatGPT account, so make sure to obtain one in advance.

openApp.heading: Open Sora 2 App
openApp.step1:
and log in with your ChatGPT account.
After logging in, you'll see a screen like below.
openApp.step2:
Enter a video prompt in the input form at the bottom. If you want to reference an image, select it from the "+" button.
In Orientation, you can choose vertical or horizontal. In Duration, you can choose 10 or 15 seconds.

cameo.heading: Generate with Cameo Feature
cameo.description:
Using the cameo feature makes it easy to generate videos of AI Nike Chan.
Some of you may not be familiar with this term, but it's not difficult at all.

specifyCharacter.heading: Specify AI Nike Chan in the Input Field
specifyCharacter.step1:
When you enter @ (at sign) in the input field, multiple options appear.
This is called cameo, and it allows you to generate videos by referencing pre-registered people or characters.
specifyCharacter.step2: For AI Nike Chan, you can use @ainikechan.

cameo.cameoProfileNote:
Works generated from registered cameos can be viewed by anyone, so use them as a reference for your creations.
For AI Nike Chan, you can view them at https://sora.chatgpt.com/profile/ainikechan.
cameo.multiCharacterNote:
The cameo feature allows you to specify multiple characters.
However, specifying 4 or more characters at the same time seems to make character breakdown more likely to occur, so caution is needed.

prompts.heading: How to Write Prompts and Examples
prompts.description1:
In video generation AI, you can generate the desired video by entering instructions called "prompts".
With Sora 2, even simple instructions allow for some freedom of movement, but to get the results you want, it's important to give specific instructions.

tips.heading: Prompt Tips:
tips.description1:
While the above example works well, fine details are often not properly reflected.
For AI Nike Chan, the hairpin shape and chest text often break down.
tips.description2:
In that case, it's important to explicitly specify fine details as character features.
For example, adding instructions like "@ainikechan wears a hairpin shaped like the letters AI" would be good.

cameo.videoPrompt3:
@ainikechan
Dressed as a wizard, riding on a broom.
A magic battle with an evil wizard whose face cannot be seen in the darkness.
Focused on combat without dialogue.
Dynamic combat action scenes.
Combat switches every 0.5 seconds.
Fantastic field with a Halloween atmosphere.

startingFrame.heading: Prepare a Starting Frame
startingFrame.description:
When referencing images, it's good to be mindful of the starting frame.
Rather than passing the three-view drawing as is, passing an image with a natural pose as the first frame tends to produce better results.
Use NanoBanana or NanoBanana Pro for images. For image generation, please see the Image Generation Tutorial page.

aspectRatioWarning.heading: About Material Aspect Ratio:
aspectRatioWarning.description:
With Sora 2, if you don't prepare an image with an aspect ratio that matches the video to be generated, unintended cropping may occur and image reference may not work well.
When generating horizontal videos, use horizontal images, and when generating vertical videos, use vertical images.

tips.heading: Prompt Tips:
tips.description1:
Even when passing reference images, fine details may not be reflected well.
For AI Nike Chan, the hairpin shape and chest text often break down.
tips.description2:
Therefore, it's important to explicitly specify fine details as character features.
By explicitly specifying character features, you can achieve more stable results.

gachaWarning.heading: About Generative AI Randomness:
gachaWarning.description:
Generative AI has a strong element of randomness, and even using the same prompt produces different results each time.
Therefore, even with a perfect prompt, you may not get the expected output, so it's important to try patiently until you get results you like.

reference.videoPrompt2: The girl in the illustration is singing Japanese anime songs passionately in a karaoke box. Cuts change every 0.5 seconds. Natural animation.

cta.heading: Enjoy Creating AI Nike Chan Fan Works!
cta.description:
Please share your creations on social media.
If you post with the hashtag "#AIニケちゃん", the administrator will definitely check it out!
